name: unemotional
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having or expressing strong feelings, often when this is surprising or a bad thing: Investigators said the couple seemed oddly unemotional about the disappearance. They described him as cold and unemotional.
not allowing strong feelings to influence your decisions: He was rational and unemotional in his response.
